name: X-Currency – The Ultimate WooCommerce currency switcher for a smoother shopping experience
author: DoatKolom

sections.description:
X-Currency Switcher is a free WooCommerce multi currency switcher for WordPress sites. With this plugin, you can create multiple custom currencies with flags, custom codes, money symbols, extra fees, money sign positions, and many more. X-currency also has the most powerful customizer available in the currency switcher market. You can create modern and unlimited switchers for your site. We provide 6 different readymade switcher templates so that you can create a beautiful currency switcher on the fly. You can show approximate product prices on shop, single, cart, and checkout pages. You can set up different coupons, and shipping rates for each currency. It allows you to exchange currency rates automatically and pay in the selected currency.

X-Currency is a WooCommerce Currency Switcher tool that is available as a shortcode and sticky.

Demo | Get Support/Contact Us | Roadmap | Make A Feature Request

🔥 Custom Currency Support

Our currency switcher allows you to create unlimited currency including custom currency like Bitcoin and many more.

🔥 Update Base Currency

From our dashboard, you can change the default currency used by your WooCommerce store. You will also find many helpful options here

🔥 Currency Custom Flag

Our currency switcher allows you to design what you want. Like, drop-down, flags. For each currency it is possible to set its own flag.

🔥 Specific product price for each currency

You can set different product price for each currency. Your site visitors can add them into cart and pay with the amount you will define for each currency.

🔥 Currency Base Payment Gateways

Allow your site visitors to pay in the selected currency. You can also disable payment gateways for any specific currency

🔥 User Geo Ip Welcome Currency

You have the control to let the site visitors see prices in their country currency! You can set what currency to display to each country

🔥 Readymade Switcher Demo

For currency swithcer style, we’re giving you template system. You can create unlimited template with our powerful customizer. Watch the video to know more about it.

🔥 Currency Auto Update

Update currency rate manually or automatically. We allows you to set time duration based on that currency rate can be auto updated

🔥 No Get Data in Link

You can remove selected currency code from the url. It’s an optional feature that can help you to keep your site url clean

🚀 Switcher Sticky Template

You can create sticky/sidebar switcher style with our powerful customizer. Show your currency switcher at any corner of the screen

🚀 Specific shipping amount for each currency

You can set a fixed shipping amount for each shipping method and each currency.

🚀 Specific coupon amount for each currency

You can set a fixed coupon amount for each coupon code and each currency.

🚀 Approximate product price

Shows approximate product price on the shop page, single page, cart page and checkout page. Page condition settings also added with this feature.

🚀 Update All Product Price According To Base Currency

You can change default product price currency. It’s a powerful feature that can help you to entirely change your base currency

🚀 Custom Css

Make your currency switcher style more beautiful than before. It’s a powerful feature for the guy who can write css code.

🚀 Hooks For Developers – Coming soon

We allows you to change any prices out of WooCommerce. Like pricing table or any other places where switching currency is important

⏰ Modal Dropdown Style – coming soon

It’s a modern style where currency list will appear into a modal with a bigger view. It helps to create better user experice

🚀 Compatibility And Tested With

  • ShopEngine Elementor WooCommerce Builder Addons, Variation Swatches, Wishlist, Products Compare – All in One Solution
  • JetWooBuilder Top-rated Elementor
    WooCommerce plugin

🔥 OUR OTHER PLUGINS

If you like using X-Currency Switcher, then consider checking out our other plugins:

  • SuperDocs – The Ultimate Knowledge Base, Wiki And Documentation Builder
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

Will it work with Gutenberg and Elementor?

Yes, it will work.
sections.changelog:
1.5.4 – 26 March 2024

  • Fixed: Option data unserialize fatal error.

1.5.3 – 22 March 2024

  • Fixed: Undefined array key “x-currency-pro/x-currency-pro.php” warning.

1.5.2 – 24 February 2024

  • Fixed: PRO version auto update issue.

1.5.1 – 24 February 2024

  • Improved: Added alt tag in currency flag img tag.
  • Fixed: Switcher template modal close issue.

1.5.0 – 30 December 2023

  • Fixed: ceil(): Argument #1 ($num) must be of type int|float error.

1.4.9 – 17 December 2023

  • Fixed: Cloudflare rocket script loader issue.

1.4.8 – 16 December 2023

  • Fixed: Switcher not working in IOS(iphone 11) issue.

1.4.7 – 12 December 2023

  • Added: Rounding decimal product prices.
  • Fixed: Shipping taxes amount not exchanging issues.

1.4.6 – 10 November 2023

  • Added: Cloudflare rocket script loader compatibility.
  • Added: WordPress 6.4 compatibility.

1.4.5 – 16 October 2023

  • Improved: Triggering x-currency loader event once dom is ready.

1.4.4 – 14 October 2023

  • Improved: Replaced switcher react component to web-component.
  • Improved: Replaced react-sortable-hoc npm package to @dnd-kit npm package.
  • Improved: Stop loading assets out of x-currency dashboard page.

1.4.3 – 21 August 2023

  • Improved: To get the user country code using WC_Geolocation class instead of third-party API.
  • Removed: Browser push notification.

1.4.2 – 12 August 2023

  • Fixed: Shipping price conflicting issue with PrintFul.
  • Fixed: Product specific price display issue.

1.4.1 – 10 June 2023

  • Fixed: Browser multiple history creating issue.
  • Fixed: Currency in_array fatal error.

1.4.0 – 23 May 2023

  • Fixed: Currency rate type not working issue.
  • Improved: Database queries are reducing 10X.
  • Improved: Call session_write_close() function after write session.
  • Improved: Move plugin structure to MVC Framework structure.

1.3.5 – 13 April 2023

  • Fixed: 0 can not be selected for decimal value for currency settings

1.3.4 – 04 February 2023

  • Added: Approximate price type control feature.
  • Added: Show approximate currency code.
  • Improved: Admin dashboard UI.

1.3.3 – 09 January 2023

  • Added: Notice close button.

1.3.2 – 27 November 2022

  • Added: X-Currency pro version release admin notice

1.3.1 – 19 November 2022

  • Fixed: Base currency not found issue
  • Improved: Optimized JS and PHP

1.3.0 – 12 November 2022

  • Fixed: Currencies rates auto refresh not working issue.
  • Fixed: Free shipping amount for each currency exchange issue.
  • Fixed: Simple product price for each currency exchange issue.
  • Fixed: Approximately cart and checkout total issue
  • Improved: Optimized js and PHP

1.2.9 – 30 October 2022

  • Fixed: Disable payment gateways setting not working issue

1.2.8 – 18 October 2022

  • Fixed: Navbar markup destroying issue

1.2.7 – 17 October 2022

  • Fixed: Subscription Issue
  • Improved: Upgrade the entire frontend with Gutenberg.

1.2.6 – 03 September 2022

  • Fixed: Sale discount percent issue.
  • Fixed: Specific product price for each currency not working issue.
  • Fixed: Currency not switching issue.

1.2.5 – 14th Aug 2022

  • Added: Fixer Api Layer aggregator.
  • Added: Currency order info metabox inside order details page.
  • Fixed: Currency rates are not updated issue, when the base currency is updated.
  • Fixed: Notification package issue with react version.
  • Improved: optimized animate js file.

1.2.4 – 13th July 2022

  • Fixed: Shortcode switcher scroll chaining issue
  • Improved: Shortcode dropdown height
  • Optimized: Scrolling related JS and css code

1.2.3 – 13th June 2022

  • Fixed: Switcher preview issue on customizer
  • Improved: Optimize JS and Css
  • Improved: Compatible with the wordpress latest version 6.0

1.2.2 – 14th May 2022

  • Added: Filter report by currencies
  • Improved: Switcher shortcode Dropdown

1.2.1 – 25th April 2022

  • Fixed: Product is_type() method undefined fatal error
  • Fixed: Routing issue with FluentCRM plugin
  • Fixed: Gutenberg editor page’s Button background issue
  • Improved: Initial loading time
  • Improved: Side Sticky demo design

1.2.0 – 23th April 2022

  • Added: Auto Fill option while creating a new currency.
  • Added: Specific product price for each currency
  • Fixed: Currency base payment gateways disable settings.
  • Improved: Optimized JS Code.
  • Improved: Improved Geo IP.
  • Improved: Transition and Plugin UI.

1.1.1 – 16th April 2022

  • Fixed: Multisite not working issue.
  • Fixed: Currency aggregator not working issue
  • Fixed: Price without cents not working issue.
  • Improved: Approximate product, cart and checkout amount.
  • Improved: Some global settings controls have been added for cart total extra fee.

1.1.0 – 14th April 2022

  • Added: Specific coupon amount for each currency
  • Added: Specific shipping amount for each currency
  • Added: Approximate product price
  • Added: Approximate cart and checkout amount
  • Added: Sticky switcher
  • Added: 3 new demos for sticky switcher
  • Added: Full width controls for shortcode switcher

1.0.0 – 30th March 2022

  • Initial release
sections.reviews:
Exceptional Plugin & Stellar Support!

By cuongngle on March 31, 2024

I've had a fantastic experience with the X-Currency plugin. The team behind it is incredibly passionate and supportive, addressing issues swiftly with prompt responses. Their dedication to quality and customer satisfaction shines through in their work. Highly recommend this plugin - you won't be disappointed with its performance and the service provided. A must-have for your WooCommerce site!

Best currency switcher out there

By iprema on February 23, 2024

The best currency switcher out there by far, I’ve tried many clunky ones. The support they provide is phenomenal, I contacted them a few times, and they respond in minutes - thank you support! This x-currency switcher plugin has done wonders to my websites, the currency switcher has a lot of great features, and is easy to setup. It’s lightweight and switches currency with greatest of ease, and enhances my websites making it look very attractive. Get it, you won’t regret it.

Excellent support

By thatsinsurance on December 30, 2023

Excellent support solved my problem very fast!

These guys are simply Amazing!

By miroslavpetrov1 on December 14, 2023

These guys are simply Amazing! I mean it! Great plugin with great customer support. I can't want more from them! You have my respect. Highly recommend it

Everything I Ever Wanted in a Multi-Currency Plugin -- Very Generous Devs

By atomicnicholas on August 30, 2023

Once in a while, a plugin comes in that addresses your problems, issues, and needs, and even makes you a free cup of delicious latte. This is one of them. It works flawlessly, works from being utilized inside Elementor and custom fields (shortcode or widget), is incredibly customizable, easy to use (unlike its convoluted old competition that mostly only works in the default uncustomized shop), and many more I won't bother typing anymore.

What I love most about it personally is that it works with JetWooBuilder!

Best of all, they provide the Pro version free (via the FB group), (and I only hope this is not a switcheroo that later forces us to buy the newer versions) but is otherwise just a huge bucket of awesome for currency switching.

Thank you to the fine folks who made this-- you guys are lifesavers, and I can't have enough great things to say about you.

Excellent plug-in with great support

By dominic2015 on August 30, 2023

currency plugin is easy to install. It didn’t have an option that allowed for checkout in only the country of origin currency so the team added some custom made code and now it works perfectly. Thanks!

Great plugin and amazing support

By electrickiwi on August 17, 2023

The plugin does everything it should and is really easy to use. Support is the real highlight though - I was experiencing some issues that I couldn't diagnose and their support team went way above and beyond to help, even setting up a call to demonstrate something I was doing wrong and checking for plugin conflicts. Very impressed and happy with the service.

Excellent plugin and support!

By anorak254 on August 13, 2023

5* service and such a great featured packed currency plugin! Thank you!

Great Plugin, Amazing Support

By nexondo on April 14, 2023

just perfect, customizable, very fast and good support!

Excellent plugin with top notch support

By tosr on February 9, 2023

I had difficulty with showing approx. prices with theme which I use, and author was very helpful, and solved this problem for me!

short_description: Easily handle multi currency with the Woo Currency Switcher. This free tool allows your customers to switch between currency options on your website.
